title: Padding
---
It defines the spacing inside a component on each side (top, left, right, bottom).

## Methods
| Method | Description |
|--------| ------------|
| `All(pad Length)` | All applies the same padding value to all four sides. |
| `Horizontal(pad Length)` | Horizontal sets the padding for the horizontal axis (left and right). |
| `Vertical(pad Length)` | Vertical sets the padding for the vertical axis (top and bottom). |
---
